description.value:
You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.rI4Xri8O6zboJjTp]{Detect Thoughts} spell, requiring no spell slot or components, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it this way again. When you cast @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.rI4Xri8O6zboJjTp]{Detect Thoughts} creatures have disadvantage on any saving throw or ability check associated with your probing. Your spellcasting ability for this spell is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. If you have spell slots of 2nd level or higher, you can cast this spell with them.

Upon selecting this feat, you will have to manually add @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.rI4Xri8O6zboJjTp]{Detect Thoughts} on your character sheet and set it to "Always Prepared" as well as updating the spellcasting ability for it if necessary.
